name: Department of Information Technology
desc: The Department of Information Technology (DIT), nestled within the College of Engineering and Information Technology (CEIT), is housed in a modern building characterized by sleek architecture and cutting-edge facilities. Its spacious atrium welcomes students and visitors, while state-of-the-art classrooms, labs, and collaborative spaces provide an ideal environment for learning and research. From interactive displays showcasing the latest advancements to dedicated research wings driving innovation, the department's building serves as a dynamic hub for aspiring technologists and researchers alike.

name: Office of Student Affairs and Services
desc: Welcome to the Office of Student Affairs and Services at Cavite State University — A cornerstone of student support and development. Established in 1980, our office has evolved to meet the diverse needs of our students. From counseling and testing to financial assistance and talent development, we're here to empower students to reach their full potential. Whether it's guidance, training, or placement services, we're committed to fostering an environment where every student can thrive intellectually, emotionally, and socially.

name: International House 2 (Dormitory)
desc: Welcome to International House 2, the epitome of campus living for everyone! Nestled near gate 1 of the campus, this modern dormitory offers a safe and welcoming environment for residents to call home. With its contemporary design and well-appointed facilities, International House 2 provides a comfortable and inclusive living space. From cozy bedrooms to communal lounges, every corner is designed to foster a sense of community and belonging. Whether studying late into the night or enjoying downtime with friends, residents of International House 2 experience the best of campus life in a supportive and vibrant environment.

name: College of Sports, Physical Education, and Recreation
desc: Introducing the College of Sports, Physical Education, and Recreation at Cavite State University, established in 1998 to promote excellence in sports across the Southern Tagalog Region. Our mission is to provide top-tier instruction in physical education and recreation sciences while fostering a culture of active living among students and the community. With a focus on leadership and collaboration, we're dedicated to shaping competent professionals and elevating the region's sporting landscape.
dept: Physical Education, Exercise and Sports Science

name: Bahay ng Alumni
desc: Welcome to Bahay ng Alumni—a cozy retreat found near the Gymnasium of the University. Our inviting rooms offer a blend of comfort and nostalgia, providing guests with a home-away-from-home experience. Whether you're here for a trip down memory lane or attending an event, we promise a memorable stay filled with warmth and hospitality.

name: National Coffee Research, Development and Extension Center
desc: Welcome to the National Coffee Research, Development, and Extension Center (NCRDEC) at Cavite State University (CvSU)—a pioneering force in Philippine coffee innovation since 2005. Our center, established under the Agriculture and Fisheries Modernization Act (AFMA) of 1997, conducts cutting-edge research, provides vital extension services, and produces top-quality planting materials. With a vision to be recognized locally and internationally for our coffee programs, we're dedicated to increasing productivity, sustainability, and global competitiveness in the Philippine coffee industry.

name: College of Economics, Management and Development Studies New Building
desc: Welcome to the College of Economics, Management, and Development Studies New Building—a modern marvel of academia and innovation! Situated at the heart of campus, this state-of-the-art facility embodies the spirit of forward-thinking education and research. With its sleek design and advanced technology, the building provides a dynamic environment for students and faculty to explore the complexities of economics, management, and development studies. From spacious lecture halls to collaborative workspaces, every corner is designed to inspire creativity and critical thinking. Whether studying economic theory, honing management skills, or researching sustainable development practices, the College of Economics, Management, and Development Studies New Building offers a vibrant setting for academic excellence and growth.

name: College of Agriculture, Forestry, Environment and Natural Resources
desc: The College of Agriculture, Forestry, Environment, and Natural Resources building embodies innovation and sustainability. Its modern design integrates seamlessly with nature, featuring spacious interiors filled with natural light and cutting-edge facilities. With a focus on eco-friendly practices, including energy-efficient systems and green rooftops, the building serves as a hub for interdisciplinary learning and research. Surrounded by lush gardens and outdoor spaces, it inspires environmental stewardship and fosters collaboration among students and faculty.
dept: Department of Forestry and Environmental Science (DFES)
Institute of Food Science and Technology (IFST)

facilities.Fruit Crops Nursery & Production: This project are focuses on the production, propagation maintenance & marketing of selected fruit crops such as rambutan, mangosteen, cacao, lemon, calamansi, lanzones, etc.
facilities.Ornamental Nursery & Production: This area is allotted for the different ornamental crops available ate the greenhouse, for propagation, and nursery establishment.
facilities.CHARMS Project: This demo area focuses on the various medicinal plants, herbs and spices available for general consumption.
facilities.High-Value Vegetable Production Area: This production area is allotted for the different high-value vegetable crops produced and managed by students conducting. Their research and entrepreneurial development studies.

name: Research Center
desc: Introducing the Research Center Building at Cavite State University: a nexus of innovation and collaboration. Equipped with cutting-edge facilities, it fosters groundbreaking research across disciplines, especially in agriculture. Designed for knowledge dissemination and external engagement, it serves as a hub for forging partnerships, training, and recognizing outstanding achievements. A beacon of progress, it embodies the university's commitment to improving lives and advancing knowledge for the community.

name: Ladislao N. Diwa Memorial Library and Museum
desc: Welcome to the Ladislao N. Diwa Memorial Library and Museum (LDMLM)—a symbol of knowledge and heritage since 1980. With a collection of over 106,000 volumes and 5,000 series titles, LDMLM honors Ladislao N. Diwa's contributions to academia. Operating under an open shelf system, our mission is to provide excellent, equitable, and relevant library services. We aim to support academic excellence, encourage maximum utilization of resources, and collaborate with all colleges and campuses to supplement research and instruction. Step inside and discover a world of knowledge and inspiration.

name: Interdisciplinary Research Building
desc: Welcome to the Interdisciplinary Research Building (IDRB) at the University. Here, cutting-edge research thrives in specialized laboratories spanning engineering, microbiology, genetics, and more. Led by expert faculty researchers, these labs are hubs of innovation, fostering collaboration and pushing the boundaries of knowledge. With state-of-the-art facilities and close coordination with the Technical Services Division, the IDRB is where breakthroughs happen. Welcome to a space where interdisciplinary exploration knows no bounds.

name: International House 1 (Dormitory)
desc: Welcome to International House 1 —a bustling dormitory designed to be a home away from home for university students. Here, students from diverse backgrounds come together to form a vibrant community, fostering lifelong friendships and unforgettable experiences. With comfortable living spaces and modern amenities, International House 1 provides a supportive environment where students can thrive academically, socially, and personally. International House 1 is currently under College of Nursing.

name: Department of Biological Sciences
desc: Welcome to the Department of Biological Sciences at the University. Our state-of-the-art facilities and passionate community of scholars are dedicated to exploring the wonders of life. From molecular biology to ecology, we're committed to advancing our understanding of the natural world and addressing global challenges. Join us on a journey of discovery and exploration. Welcome to the heart of scientific inquiry.
